title: Cheesy Potato and Vegetable Soup
ingredients: ['6 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 carrot, chopped', 'water to cover', '3 sticks celery, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '110g margarine', '950ml milk', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons chicken stock granules', '225g processed cheese, such as Kraft singles, unwrapped and chopped', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '120ml milk']
